title: Yasuo buff
body: This is a question for the Riot development team. Are you planing on buffing Yasuo in the near future, like you were going to do in patch 7.17? Or are you going to rework him entirely?

replies.body:
"Riven is really feeling the loss of dps from fervor..." BUFF

Yasuo is feeling the loss of base stats/fervor more than anyone right now. :/

Hope RIOT will decide what they want to do with him.
